Texts.Eng: All I need to do is replace my ^orange;STL Drive^reset; with this ^cyan;FTL Drive^reset; and I can travel between stars.

To travel through space I need to build a ^cyan;Small FTL Drive^reset; on a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;. I should research and build an ^orange;STL drive^reset;, and then mine some ^pink;erchius crystals^reset; from a moon.
